name: EsCave
description:
Made by Glyn Fleming-Bone with help from Eli Staunton-Clark, in the 48hr KiwiJam 2020.

You've found some treasure at the end of a deep cave, but on your way out the ceiling begins to crumble behind you. Make it out whilst on the brink of being sealed inside forever.

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Run

E - Hold the box (it works best from the front)

Left click - Grapple onto wooden beams (when you get the grappling hook)

Sorry for the large filesize;;;
